\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 92022}

\subsection*{A Lift from Dysphoria}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{NN}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 600 mg & oral & Moclobemide & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 75.00 kg\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
After first week taking moclobemide (Aurorix), I notice quick improvement in mood, sleep, and interest of things.



Aurorix practically has no anticholinergic effect, no sedative effect, virtually non toxic to the liver.



As it is a RIMA, with the therapeutic dose, there is no need for food restriction.



I tried most antidepressants, but found this one works well for me.



It relieves my dysphoric feeling.

\end{document}
